logic.playerState

Interface BotBehavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAIPlayer

    public interface BotBehavior
    Interface implementing the bots abillity to make a valid turn in the game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bank doInitialSelect(Bank currBank, int bankOrd)
      The initial select from the current bank will be performed
      void doLastTurn(Bank currBank)
      Bot only lays down the previous selected domino without selecting anything from the next bank since it is the end of the current round and there is nothing to select from.
      void doStandardTurn(Bank currBank, Bank nextBank)
      Bot selects a domino on the next bank and lays the previous selected domino on his board
      Bank selectFromBank(Bank bank, int ordBank, boolean displayOnGui)
      Bot selects a domino from a given bank, and returns the selected bank index
      void updateSelectedDom(Bank bank)
      In Order to make a valid selection a player has to know which dominos are located where on the board, a already selected domino kind of already has a place to which the player intended to lay it in the next move.

    • Method Detail

      • selectFromBank

        Bank selectFromBank(Bank bank,
                    int ordBank,
                    boolean displayOnGui)
        Bot selects a domino from a given bank, and returns the selected bank index
        Parameters:
        bank - the bank that the player will select from
        ordBank - ordinal value of the bank
        displayOnGui - flag to determine if the selection will be displayed on the gui
        Returns:
        the selected bank index

      • doStandardTurn

        void doStandardTurn(Bank currBank,
                    Bank nextBank)
        Bot selects a domino on the next bank and lays the previous selected domino on his board
        Parameters:
        currBank - the current bank from which the domino will be provided
        nextBank - the next bank from which the player will select the next domino

      • doLastTurn

        void doLastTurn(Bank currBank)
        Bot only lays down the previous selected domino without selecting anything from the next bank since it is the end of the current round and there is nothing to select from.
        Parameters:
        currBank - the current bank from which the domino will be provided

      • doInitialSelect

        Bank doInitialSelect(Bank currBank,
                     int bankOrd)
        The initial select from the current bank will be performed
        Parameters:
        currBank - the current bank from which the player will select from
        bankOrd - ordinal value of the bank
        Returns:
        a modified bank on which the player has selected a domino

      • updateSelectedDom

        void updateSelectedDom(Bank bank)
        In Order to make a valid selection a player has to know which dominos are located where on the board, a already selected domino kind of already has a place to which the player intended to lay it in the next move. After loading in a file the player has no information about where the player who selected the domino wanted to put it. To clear things up, the player finds a new position on the board and already lays it internally while this is not shown on the gui.
        Parameters:
        bank - bank from which the domino will be layed
